      • train

        public boolean train(Matrix trainingData,
            Matrix trainingLabel,
            int labelAttrIndex)
        Train data
        参数:
        trainingData - - training data
        trainingLabel - - labels for training data
        var_idx - - starting index of feature to train
        labelAttrIndex - - column index of label for each training data
        返回:
        whether the training success.
